section.title: mapbuilder-lib release process
section.para: This article describes the steps to follow when building a mapbuilder-lib release.

varlistentry.term: Notify developers that you are about to make a release

listitem.para: At least 24 hours before building a release, send an email to the mapbuilder-lib developers notifying them you are about to cut a release. This should allow them to ensure their fixes are in the code base.

varlistentry.term: Check all code back into CVS

listitem.para: If you have not done so already, check all the code you have been editing into CVS.
Update and commit CHANGES file with updates between the last release and this one. These files should be in the base directory.
List of problems fixed since last build:
Select Status=Closed, Group=[last release], Sort By=Priority
Ensure you have the latest files from CVS.
Tag the files that should be in the release. (Usually, not all files in CVS are included in a release).
The <tag> should be of the form: mapbuilder-lib-[number]-[status]
listitem.programlisting: cd mapbuilder/ cvs tag <tag> bin CHANGES demo design docs GPL index.html lib LICENSE metrics README server

listitem.para: Exporting code from CVS is the same as checking it out, except that the CVS/ directories are not checked out as well.
listitem.programlisting: cd ~/tmp export CVS_RSH=ssh export CVSROOT=:ext:camerons@cvs.sourceforge.net:/cvsroot/mapbuilder cvs export -r <tag> mapbuilder

listitem.para: In a broswer, view all the demos at http://localhost:8080/mapbuilder/demo
Refer to the Sourceforge File Release System for more information.
set ftp client to binary mode
From the http://sourceforge.net/projects/mapbuilder, select Admin, File Releases, Add Release.
Walk through the various forms. For description of changes, use the text from the CHANGES file.
Download the release from sourceforge, uncompress it, and check it.

listitem.programlisting: scp ~/tmp/mapbuilder/dist/mapbuilder-lib-[version].zip \ username@mapbuilder.sf.net ssh -l username mapbuilder.sf.net unzip mapbuilder-lib-[version].zip mv mapbuilder /home/groups/m/ma/mapbuilder/htdocs/mapbuilder-lib-[version] cd /home/groups/m/ma/mapbuilder/htdocs rm mapbuilder ln -s mapbuilder-lib-[version] mapbuilder

varlistentry.term: Install release on the Demonstration server

listitem.para: TBD: Demo server is yet to be identified.
Send an email notification to mapbuilder-announce@lists.sourceforge.net with text from the CHANGES file.

varlistentry.term: Create a new group in in the Sourceforge bug list
Set all outstanding bugs to be assigned to the new release group
